name: NSDraggingSession
desc: The encapsulation of a drag-and-drop action that supports modification of the drag while in progress.

items.name: var draggingPasteboard: NSPasteboard
items.desc: Returns the pasteboard object that contains the data being dragged.

items.name: var animatesToStartingPositionsOnCancelOrFail: Bool
items.desc: Controls whether the dragging image animates back to its starting point on a cancelled or failed drag.

items.name: var draggingFormation: NSDraggingFormation
items.desc: Controls the dragging formation when the drag is not over the source or a valid destination.

items.name: var draggingSequenceNumber: Int
items.desc: Returns a number that uniquely identifies the dragging session.

items.name: func enumerateDraggingItems(options: NSDraggingItemEnumerationOptions, for: NSView?, classes: [AnyClass], searchOptions: [NSPasteboard.ReadingOptionKey : Any], using: (NSDraggingItem, Int, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
var draggingLocation: NSPoint
items.desc: The current cursor location of the drag in screen coordinates.

items.name: var draggingLeaderIndex: Int
items.desc: The index of the dragging item under the cursor.
